description: '''Croatian hip hop''' is a [[music genre|genre of music]], and a culture that covers a variety of styles of [[hip hop music]] made in [[Croatia]]. Croatian hip hop was originally influenced by the [[Hip hop music|American hip hop scene]] and introduced to Croatia in the mid-1990s. Croatian hip hop, particularly that originating from [[Rijeka]] and [[Zagreb]] in the 1990s, was mainly concentrated on social issues due to the corruptive system of government at the time. In the 2000s, Croatian hip hop started becoming more mainstream and it spread to [[City of Split|Split]] developing its own hip hop style.
